content.p: The UoN Asia Research Institute is pleased to welcome political scientist Associate Professor Bridget Welsh as a Honorary Research Associate. While at UNARI, she will be working on a book that examines voting behavior in Malaysia. She has several ongoing projects in the region, in Malaysia where she will be writing on Sarawak politics, as well as a book on longtime Democratic Action Party politician, Lim Kit Siang; another on Indonesia (an update on democracy and the Habibie legacy/era), and finally, a project on internet politics in the region. She can be reached here. telephone: +603 8924 8000 fax: +603 8924 8001 email: enquiries@nottingham.edu.my
